install.install_code: $this->database()->query("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `".Phpfox::getT('strongbox_feed')."` ( `strongbox_id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id_sb` int(10) NOT NULL, `feed_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `comment_id` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `type_id_sb` int(10) NOT NULL, `app_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `privacy` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `privacy_comment` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `type_id` varchar(75) NOT NULL, `user_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `parent_user_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `item_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `feed_reference` int(10) NOT NULL, `parent_feed_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `parent_module_id` int(75) DEFAULT NULL, `time_update` int(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`strongbox_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;");
